data.text: @jonlindendavies @bigdavehotrod77 Watford away over the Xmas period after that 3-0 defeat.
@BannisterMonty They were indeed. Football wise, was so good for villa.
@bigdavehotrod77 And what a shit game it was.
@bigdavehotrod77 Saved us from going down the flu did. Oh I mean covid

@VillaCannock Yep. Stuck in traffic on way to ground too. 2 hours to get there. We left as 4th went in and lad driving was desperate for a beer so took us 40 minutes to get back to Solihull, dump car and get boozer!!!
@bigdavehotrod77 Thank goodness, from a Villa perspective! Before that enforced break, they were on an express train to the championship.
